Fitting Air Inlet: G ¼

name: ARK 500 Bar High Pressure Hydro Blaster
make: Ark Vision Spare and Engineering Pte Ltd
description:
Voltage Supply: 440V / 60Hz
Power: 22 kW
Motor Speed: 1750 rpm
Flow Inlet Pressure: 22 L/min
Pressure: 500 Bar
Max Water Temperature: 60°C
Inlet Size: G ¾
Inlet Pressure: 5.0 Bar
High Pressure Gun: ARK 600
Nozzle Tips: 0°, 15°, 25°, 40° + 1x spare rotating nozzle
High Pressure Pipe: 1 × 30m
Electrical Wire: 1 × 5m
Suction Pipe: 1 × 3.5m
Dimensions: 1030 × 720 × 850 mm
Weight: 380 kg

Advantages of Hydro Blasting:
• Environmentally cleaner process than sandblasting
• Reduces manpower, saving time and money
• High cleaning efficiency

Advantages of ARK 500:
• Easy and low maintenance (spares at competitive prices)
• Long service life
• Water supply booster pump & triple piston pump (maintains pressure & flow rate)
• Simple operation
• 1-year warranty, valid with correct usage under manual guidelines
